attributes.action: Declare the result of the EU Referendum Null & Void.
attributes.additional_details:
Brexit whistleblower who worked for the leave campaign admitted the leave campaign cheated. 

https://www.ft.com/content/13ec834c-2f99-11e8-b5bf-23cb17fd1498
https://www.channel4.com/news/brexit-campaign-was-totally-illegal-claims-whistleblower
attributes.background:
Vote Leave campaign broke the law by over-spending on campaign financing.
Democracy is a system of rule by laws, not by individuals. To ensure our basic rights are protected & to preserve our democracy, declare the result null & void and have a new referendum that follows the letter of the law.
